channel.title: Mytechramblings.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Mytechramblings.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Announcing dotnetramblings.com or how to build a .NET news aggregator site.
item.description: Let's check how I build my new site www.dotnetramblings.com. This site is a .NET news aggregator that updates its content every three hours. The main technologies employed to build it include Hugo, Python and Github Actions. Link to article: https://www.mytechramblings.com/posts/building-a-dotnet-news-aggregator-site/

item.title: Building and deploying a .NET 8 App on an ARM64 processor using Azure Pipelines and AWS ECS Fargate. Part 2: Demo
item.description: In this two-part series, Iâ€™m going to show you how to build and deploy a .NET 8 app container image that targets an ARM64 processor. In part 2, we will attempt to perform an end-to-end process. This will involve building a .NET 8 API, containerizing the app targeting an ARM64 processor using Azure Pipelines, and deploying it on AWS ECS Fargate. Furthermore, a benchmark will also be conducted to compare the performance of the application running on an ARM64 Fargate container versus an AMD64 Fargate container.
